mapper.select: SELECT t_doctor_drug.drugid, CONCAT(t_drug.drugname,'--',t_drug.standard,'--',t_drug.company) AS showname FROM t_doctor_drug LEFT JOIN t_hospital_drug ON t_doctor_drug.drugid = t_hospital_drug.drugid AND t_hospital_drug.hospitalid = #{hid, jdbcType=INTEGER} LEFT JOIN t_drug ON t_doctor_drug.drugid = t_drug.id WHERE t_doctor_drug.doctorid = #{doctorid, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND t_drug.iszy = 1 AND t_hospital_drug.id IS NOT NULL;
